ENGLISH: This event is meant to be used as an easily triggerable blank slate for testing the effect of some code. If this is not empty, somebody forgot to remove what they were testing when they were checking it in.
This event gives all reforms, democracy government, liberty national value, and a lot of other immigration buffs.
This event gives all technologies to the current country.
This event ends all wars this country is currently in.
This event deals with cores to allow debugging of core-related conditions decisions.
Give me cores on all my land
Remove any cores I don't own
This event removes ownership of any sea tiles that may have accidentally befallen a country due to typos when using the changeowner command as the game tends to bug out if a sea tile has an owner.
Select which type of government to switch to. Note that without setting the gov_reassign_exemption flag, this change might get rolled back by a cleanup decision.

This event lets you set or clear the gov_reassign_exemption which prevents your government from being changed by a cleanup decision in situations where this your government is not appropriate for your situation (e.g. a country with a British colonial government that isn't a puppet of Britain).
This event lets you set or clear the vote_reform_blocker, pol_reform_blocker and soc_reform_blocker which are used as a generic way to prevent a country from passing the relevant reforms.
